SELECT 
    ki.id, 
    ki.title, 
    ki.category,
    ts_rank(kc.search_vector, query, 32) AS rank
FROM 
    knowledge_chunks kc
    JOIN knowledge_items ki ON kc.knowledge_item_id = ki.id,
    websearch_to_tsquery(''italian'', ''contratti locazione'') query
WHERE 
    kc.search_vector @@ query
    AND kc.junk = FALSE
ORDER BY rank DESC
LIMIT 5;
")
